name: @esotericsoftware/spine-ts
description: The official Spine Runtimes for the web.

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: npx rimraf spine-core/dist spine-canvas/dist spine-webgl/dist spine-player/dist spine-threejs/dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:modules && concurrently "npm run build:core" "npm run build:canvas" "npm run build:webgl" "npm run build:player" "npm run build:threejs"
scripts.build:player: npx copyfiles -f spine-player/css/spine-player.css spine-player/dist/ && npx npx esbuild --bundle spine-player/src/index.ts --tsconfig=spine-player/tsconfig.json  --sourcemap --outfile=spine-player/dist/iife/spine-player.js --format=iife --global-name=spine
scripts.minify: npx esbuild --minify spine-core/dist/iife/spine-core.js --outfile=spine-core/dist/iife/spine-core.min.js && npx esbuild --minify spine-canvas/dist/iife/spine-canvas.js --outfile=spine-canvas/dist/iife/spine-canvas.min.js && npx esbuild --minify spine-player/dist/iife/spine-player.js --outfile=spine-player/dist/iife/spine-player.min.js && npx esbuild --minify spine-webgl/dist/iife/spine-webgl.js --outfile=spine-webgl/dist/iife/spine-webgl.min.js && npx esbuild --minify spine-threejs/dist/iife/spine-threejs.js --outfile=spine-threejs/dist/iife/spine-threejs.min.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "npx live-server --no-browser" "npm run dev:modules" "npm run dev:canvas" "npm run dev:webgl" "npm run dev:player" "npm run dev:threejs"

author: Esoteric Software LLC
